headline: LEYBOLD RBS ROOTS PUMPING SYSTEM 91 CFM
keywords: roots blowers stacks pump stacks blower packages
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Vacuum Pumping Systems
specstable:
Manufacturer Leybold
Model WSU151/D40BCS
Pumping Speed 90.9 CFM (2,568.6 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 1.00E-4(En) torr (1.33E-4 mbar)
Inlet Flange ASA 76.2 mm (3.000 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 40.0 mm (1.575 in)
Backing Pump Model TRIVAC D40BCS
Roots Pump Model RUVAC WSU 151
Motor Horsepower 3 HP
Refurbished YES
Accessories D40BCS has ARS 40-65 (exhaust filter with oil feedback)
and CFS 40-65 (chemical filter)
Other Information Displacement: 32 cfm
Max. differential pressure: 98 Torr
Normal starting pressure: 50 Torr
Oil capacity: 2.7 qts
Nominal rotation speed: 1800 rpm
Power Requirements 208/230 V 60 Hz 3 Phase
Condition Very Good
Exterior Dimensions
Width 36.000 in (91.4 cm)
Depth 25.000 in (63.5 cm)
Height 35.000 in (88.9 cm)
Weight 560 lb (254 kg)
